subject: Can't log in - urgent meeting in 2 hours
description: I've tried resetting my password 3 times but the email isn't coming through. I have a client meeting in 2 hours and need access ASAP!

subject: Need invoice for Q4 billing
description: Hi, can you send me the invoice for November? We need it for our accounting department.

subject: Notion integration request
description: We'd love to see Notion integration added to FlowTask. Is this on the roadmap? When can we expect it?

subject: Canceling subscription - switching to competitor
description: We've decided to move to Asana. The pricing increase isn't justified. Please process our cancellation.

subject: Data export not working
description: When I try to export our project data to CSV, I get an error message. This has been happening for 3 days now.
